pr_title: ISPN-11630 Server multimap get with metadata incorrect response

timeline.message:
ISPN-11630 Server multimap get with metadata incorrect response

* Server response should be empty when the operation status is
  KeyDoesNotExist (0x02).
* Multimap get without metadata should reply with status
  KeyDoesNotExist (0x02) if the key does not exist.

timeline.bodyText: why are we adding assert here instead of just firing the logs and exceptions ?
timeline.author: karesti

replies.bodyText: Unlike release or releaseClosedChannel, here the client is guaranteed to be catching the AssertionError, because it needs a channel to actually execute the operation. However, this code path is really uncommon, so I doubt it will ever trigger the assert. I'll update it to just log a warning, like the others.
replies.author: danberindei

ISPN-11630 Remove HotRodTestingUtil.startHotRodServerWithDelay

* Remove delay and perf parameters from startHotRodServer
* Add TestGlobalConfigurationBuilder.cacheStarting() callback
  and use it in HotRodConcurrentStartTest

ISPN-11630 Improve logging of channel events

* Log the ChannelPool statistics more often
* Add separate method to update ChannelPool statistics on close
* Log channel reads and writes on the server side
